text:
Liga
Bar√ßa: a discomfort with Arthur?
Yet author of very good performances since the beginning of the season, the midfielder does not appear in the group to face Slavia Prague.
05 Nov 2019, 12:40 by Thomas Rassouli



Bar√ßa crosses an area of turbulence at the beginning of the season. Already conspired at the end of last season, Ernesto Valverde still sees his place challenged by supporters, following the debacle of this weekend against Levante. Antoine Griezmann has crystallized this malaise by making the front page of the Spanish press several times, his integration into the blaugrana dressing room talking a lot, just like his integration into the Catalan game. But this Tuesday, it is another player who questions.




A problem with Valverde?




Arthur + 8 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Not called for the match against Slavia Prague in the Champions League, Arthur was this weekend with the Blaugrana. The midfielder, however, would suffer no injury according to As, to the point that the media questioned the existence of a possible malaise between Ernesto Valverde and his player. The coach could speak tonight on the subject, that the Spanish press should obviously address.
